    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1187</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Achan takes the spoils of Jericho1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Achan nimmt verdirbt von Jericho1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Achan prend se corrompt de Jericho1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Achan faz exame do spoils de Jericho1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Achan prende guasta di Jericho1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Achan παίρνει χαλά Jericho1</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Achan toma estropea de Jericho1</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">learners are introduced to Sefer Yehoshua, Chapter 7 by reading the text and dividing it into sections.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sefer Yehoshua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bble</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anfänger werden zu Sefer Yehoshua, Kapitel 7 
eingeführt, indem man den Text liest und ihn in Kapitel unterteilt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">des étudiants sont présentés à Sefer Yehoshua,
le chapitre 7 en lisant le texte et en le divisant en sections.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os learners são introduzidos a Sefer Yehoshua, 
capítulo 7 lendo o texto e dividindo o em seções.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i principianti sono introdotti a Sefer Yehoshua, 
capitolo 7 leggendo il testo e dividendolo nelle sezioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι αρχάριοι εισάγονται σε Sefer Yehoshua, 
κεφάλαιο 7 με την ανάγνωση του κειμένου και τη διαίρεση του σε 
τμήματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">introducen a los principiantes a Sefer Yehoshua, 
capítulo 7 leyendo el texto y dividiéndolo en secciones.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sefer Yehoshua</string>
          </keyword>
